question.title: Sessionimpl :: isDirty return false even when there are objects locked with OPTIMISTIC_FORCE_INCREMENT
question.body:
When entity is marked OPTIMISTIC_FORCE_INCREMENT it is expected to always increment the Version field, even when no changes occured. But when SessionImpl is asked isDirty() it returs false. Thus in some circumstances, when manually checking the state, user might not do flush() thus discard that Version upgrade information.

Are here any Hibernate devs? Why session is not marked dirty when we entityManager.lock(object, OPTIMISTIC_FORCE_INCREMENT) ?

Regards
